description:
Kouminkan no Baa-chan is an old lady from the community centre who takes part in the survival game at the summer festival and is featured as one of the seven warriors in the Wild 7 parody ending of episode eight.
She later appears with bandages covering up injuries buying radish from Koyori at the same festival during the Sora no Otoshimono: Tokei Jikake no Angeloid film and is seen in the ending of episode three of Sora no Otoshimono Forte as one of the contenders in the sumo wrestling tournament, wearing a tiger mask.
name: Kouminkan no Baa-chan
